text: @HillaryClinton Not even you could kill that many people a day,.................. but at least you tried. Maybe if you included the Haitian deaths you and Monica's boyfriend caused you would be close.  What about Libyans?  I think you have beat Covid-19? I think you ARE more deadly than Covid-19
